title: Python for Data Analysis: Zero to Pandas in 40 Hours
description: Master the basics of data analysis with Python in just four hours. This online course will introduce the Python interface and explore popular packages.
career: Upon completion, you'll be prepared for roles such as Junior Data Analyst, Business Intelligence Analyst, Marketing Analyst, or Research Assistant, and you'll have a solid foundation for further study in Data Science.
learn: Write fundamental Python code with confidence.
Set up a professional data analysis environment (Jupyter Notebooks).
Efficiently manipulate and analyze data using Pandas DataFrames.
Clean and prepare messy real-world datasets for analysis.
Perform grouping, aggregation, and summary statistics.
Create informative and professional data visualizations.
Complete a full data analysis project to add to your portfolio.
for: Analysts, marketers, or students who want to add data analysis skills to their toolkit.
Anyone curious about data science and looking for a structured, beginner-friendly introduction.

modules.name: Module 1: Python Fundamentals – Your First Steps
Module 2: Introduction to Data Analysis with NumPy
Module 3: Data Wrangling with Pandas – The Core of the Course
Module 4: Data Visualization with Matplotlib & Seaborn
Module 5: Capstone Project – Putting It All Together

title: Understanding Artificial Intelligence
description: Learn the basic concepts of Artificial Intelligence, such as machine learning, deep learning, NLP, and generative AI.
career: Entry-level AI Research Assistant, or Data Entry Specialist familiar with AI tools.
learn: Understand key AI terms and applications.
Differentiate between AI, machine learning, and deep learning.
Explore real-world AI tools and case studies.
for: Students and professionals exploring technology trends.

title: Introduction to JavaScript
description: Learn how to control the flow of a program and use JavaScript to power dynamic behaviors on websites.
learn: Understand the basics of JavaScript syntax.
Work with variables, loops, and conditionals.
Manipulate the DOM to create interactive web pages.
for: Students transitioning from HTML/CSS to programming.

title: Java Programming Fundamentals
description: Build robust applications with Java. Learn object-oriented programming, data structures, and algorithms.
career: Java Developer, Backend Engineer, Android Developer.
for: Developers switching to Java from other languages

title: HTML & CSS for Beginners
description: Learn to build beautiful, responsive websites with HTML5 and CSS3. No prior experience required.
career: Front-End Developer, Web Designer, UI/UX Designer.
learn: Build responsive layouts with Flexbox and Grid
for: Anyone wanting to build their first website

title: React.js - The Complete Guide
description: Master React.js with Hooks, Context API, Redux, and build real-world projects.
career: React Developer, Frontend Engineer, Full-Stack Developer.
learn: Manage state with Hooks and Context
Work with APIs and external data

title: SQL for Data Analysis
description: Learn to extract, transform, and analyze data using SQL queries. Essential for any data-related role.
career: Data Analyst, Business Analyst, Database Administrator.
learn: Work with multiple tables using JOINs
Solve real business problems with SQL

title: Node.js Backend Development
description: Build scalable backend applications with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Learn authentication, APIs, and deployment.
career: Backend Developer, Full-Stack Developer, DevOps Engineer.

title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
description: Learn the principles of user interface and user experience design. Create intuitive and beautiful digital products.
career: UI/UX Designer, Product Designer, Web Designer.

title: Figma for Beginners
description: Master Figma from scratch. Learn to design interfaces, create prototypes, and collaborate with teams.
career: UI Designer, UX Designer, Graphic Designer.

title: C++ Programming for Beginners
description: Learn C++ from scratch. Master object-oriented programming, memory management, and build your first applications in one of the most powerful programming languages.
career: C++ Developer, Game Developer, Embedded Systems Engineer, Software Engineer.
learn: Work with pointers and memory management
for: Programmers switching to C++ from other languages

title: Unity Game Development Fundamentals
description: Create your first 2D and 3D games with Unity. Learn C# scripting, game physics, animation, and publish your own game.
career: Game Developer, Unity Developer, Game Designer, VR/AR Developer.
learn: Write C# scripts for game mechanics
